titles.title: GRANT Act
Grant Reform and New Transparency Act of 2013
To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide transparency and require certain standards in the award of Federal grants, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 19 - 15.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
